              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Employment
      Agreement between the Company and Jeffrey
  Steiner:</font></font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Term
      of the Agreement:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Pursuant
      to the Derivative Settlement, the term under this employment agreement is
      thirty (30) months, extended annually by an additional 12 months unless
      either party gives timely notice not to extend the
    agreement.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="middle" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Minimum
      Base Salary Under </font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">the
      Agreement:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">As
      determined by the Board of Directors. However, see description immediately
      below regarding current base salary.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Current
      Base Salary:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Pursuant
      to the terms of the Derivative Settlement, effective as of January 12,
      2006, Jeffrey Steiner&#8217;s aggregate base-pay compensation under all his
      employment agreements was reduced to $1,325,000 per year. Such reduction
      shall remain in place until such time as the Compensation Committee and
      Jeffrey Steiner agree on the terms of a new or amended employment
      agreement. Prior to January 12, 2006, Jeffrey Steiner&#8217;s aggregate base
      salary under all his employment agreements was $2,500,000 per
      annum.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Payments
      in Event of Death:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Estate
      to receive an amount equal to one year&#8217;s base salary, plus bonuses for the
      fiscal year in which death occurred.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="middle" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Payments
      in Event of </font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Termination
      Due to Disability:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Base
      salary until the date of termination, and fifty percent of base salary for
      two years thereafter, plus bonuses for the fiscal year in which disability
      occurred.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Change
      in Control Payments:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      connection with the December 3, 2002, sale of Fairchild Fasteners to Alcoa
      Inc., our Board of Directors determined that Jeffrey Steiner was entitled
      to a change of control payment in the amount of $6,280,000. Fifty percent
      (50%) of such payment was made to Jeffrey Steiner during January to June
      2003. The remaining 50% ($3,140,000) will be paid upon Jeffrey Steiner&#8217;s
      termination of employment with Fairchild. No other change of control
      payments are provided for in Jeffrey Steiner&#8217;s employment
      agreement.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Split-Dollar
      Life Insurance:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Pursuant
      to the Derivative Settlement, the Company and Jeffrey Steiner executed an
      agreement confirming that the Company&#8217;s obligations under Jeffrey
      Steiner&#8217;s split-dollar life insurance policy are irrevocably terminated
      and released.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="top" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Confidentiality
      and</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Non-competition:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      employment agreement is subject to a three year confidentiality obligation
      and a two year non-competition obligation.&#160;&#160;No special waiver
      provisions apply to these duties.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>

            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Pursuant

    agreement.</font></div>

            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Year

      of Fairchild Switzerland, Inc., the termination of which branch was
      registered on December 5, 2007.</font></div>

      Base Salary Under </font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">the
      Agreement:</font></div>

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Greater
      of $400,000 or 680,000 Swiss Francs per year, but not more than $400,000.
      However, see description immediately below regarding current base
      salary.</font></div>

          </tr>

      Base Salary:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Pursuant
      to the terms of the Derivative Settlement, effective as of January 12,

    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Term
      of the Agreement:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Pursuant
      to the Derivative Settlement, the term under this employment agreement is
      two years, expiring January 12, 2008.&#160;&#160;The Derivative Settlement
      did not affect his prior employment contract&#8217;s provision that his
      employment will extend by one year terms as long as neither party has
      given 90 days notice of termination.&#160;&#160;This provision runs from
      August 1 to August 1, rather than from January 12 to January
      12.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Minimum
      Base Salary Under </font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">the
      Agreement:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">$540,000.
      However, see description immediately below regarding current base
      salary.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Current
      Base Salary:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Pursuant
      to the terms of the Derivative Settlement, effective as of January 12,
      2006, Eric Steiner&#8217;s base-pay was reduced to $535,500 per year. Such
      reduction shall remain in place until such time as the Compensation
      Committee and Eric Steiner agree on the terms of a new or amended
      employment agreement. Prior to January 12, 2006, Eric Steiner&#8217;s base
      salary was $725,000 per annum.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Payments
      in Event of Death:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Same
      as the Company&#8217;s CEO.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Payments
      in Event of </font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Termination
      Due to Disability:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Same
      as the Company&#8217;s CEO.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="top" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Payments
      in the&#160;&#160;event of </font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">a
      &#8220;change in control&#8221;:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      connection with the sale of Fairchild Fasteners to Alcoa Inc., our Board
      of Directors determined that Eric Steiner was entitled to a change of
      control payment in the amount of $5,434,000.&#160;&#160;Fifty percent
      (50%) of such payment was made to Eric Steiner in January
      2003.&#160;&#160;The remaining 50% was paid in four equal and consecutive
      quarterly installments, with the first installment made on March 3, 2003,
      and the last installment made in January 2004.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      connection with such change of control award, Eric Steiner&#8217;s employment
      agreement was amended, pursuant to which he relinquished any future change
      of control payments under such employment agreement.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="top" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Confidentiality
      and </font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">non-competition:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      contract is subject to a permanent confidentiality obligation and a one
      year non-competition obligation.&#160;&#160;No special waiver provisions
      apply to these duties.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>

      Agreement between the Company and Donald
  Miller</font>:</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>

          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Payments
      in the event of </font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Termination
      Without Cause:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Two
      (2) times then current annual base salary, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">plus</font> 1 times current
      annual base salary in lieu of bonus.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;

      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Payments
      in the event of </font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">a
      &#8220;change in control&#8221;:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      connection with the sale of Fairchild Fasteners to Alcoa Inc., our Board
      of Directors determined that Mr. Miller was entitled to a change of
      control payment in the amount of $1,125,000. Fifty percent (50%) of such
      payment was made to Mr. Miller in December 2002. The remaining 50% was
      paid in four equal and consecutive quarterly installments, with the first
      installment made on March 3, 2003, and the last installment made in
      January, 2004.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      connection with such change of control award, the letter agreement between

    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Employment
      Agreement between PoloExpress and Klaus
  Esser:</font></font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On May
30, 2007, Mr. Esser&#8217;s employment agreement was amended and restated
retroactively to January 1, 2006, as described in a Form 8-K filed June 5, 2007
by the Company.&#160;&#160;The initial and amended and restated agreements are
summarized below.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div align="left">
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="77%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Term
      of the Agreement:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      initial agreement provided for a term of three years ending on December
      31, 2008. Either party could elect to terminate the contract as of
      December 31, 2008 by giving nine (9) months prior written notice. If the
      contract was not terminated as of December 31, 2008, it continued in place
      until either party gave twelve (12) months prior written notice of
      termination.&#160;&#160;The initial term of the amended and restated
      agreement is 7 years, beginning on January 1, 2006, and ending on December
      31, 2012, subject to certain provisions for automatic
renewal.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Base
      Salary and Bonuses:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Base
      pay compensation to Mr. Esser during fiscal 2006 initially was 240,000
      Euros per year. In addition, if PoloExpress had an annual EBITDA of more
      than 6 million Euros, <font size="+0">Mr. Esser was entitled </font>to a
      bonus for such year equal to 5% of the total EBITDA of
      PoloExpress.&#160;&#160;The amended and restated agreement provides for an
      increase in base salary of 60,000 Euros, to 300,000 Euros per year, and
      bonus amounts payable as follows:</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div>&#160;</div>
    <div align="left">
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="27%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="26%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">FiscalYears</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Ending
      until <font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">September</font> 30,
      2008</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">September
      30, 2009</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">After
      September 30, 2009</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="20%">
              <div>&#160;</div>
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">EBITDA
      threshold</font></font></font></div>
              <div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5 Million
      Euros or more</font></div>
              <div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">6 Million
      Euros or more</font></div>
              <div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">7 Million
      Euros or more</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="27%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Percentage<font style="DISPLAY: inline">Bonus</font></font>&#160;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">5%
      of EBITDA&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">6%
      of EBITDA&#160;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">6%
      of EBITDA</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div>&#160;</div>
    <div align="left">
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify">&#160;</div>
              <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      bonus for each year is payable in monthly installments. The actual bonus
      amount is determined at the end of each year, after EBITDA is confirmed.
      If the aggregate monthly installments paid are less than or more than the
      amounts due, the Company or Mr. Esser, respectively, shall repay the other
      party for the difference.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div align="left">
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="23%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Non-Compete
      Payments:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="77%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Following
      termination of employment, Mr. Esser shall not compete for a period of 24
      months, provided that PoloExpress continues to compensate Mr. Esser during
      such period at the rate of fifty percent (50%) of his average
      compensation. Average compensation is based on the last three years of
      employment, and includes base pay and bonuses. Within twenty-eight (28)
      days of the termination of employment, PoloExpress may elect not to
      enforce the two-year non-compete covenant, in which case Mr. Esser shall
      not compete for a period of one year (as specified in Paragraph 75a of the
      German Commercial Code) and PoloExpress will compensate Mr. Esser at the
      rate of 30,000 Euros per month during such one year
      period.&#160;&#160;Under the amended and restated agreement, starting
      January 1, 2009, following termination of employment, the PoloExpress
      option to elect not to enforce the two-year non-compete provision is
      terminated.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>

      Banner Aerospace, Inc. and Warren D.
Persavich:</font></div>

            <td valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">$</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="9%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: normal">2,895</font></font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>

      <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">

      Report which accompanies this Proxy Statement sets forth the valuation
      method and assumptions used to calculate accrued
  benefits.</font></div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">93</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Defined Benefit Pension
Plan</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">A defined
benefit pension plan, the Retirement Plan for Employees of The Fairchild
Corporation (&#8220;Plan&#8221;), is maintained for eligible employees and executives in the
United States.&#160;&#160;Benefits are paid to plan participants under a formula
based on credited service and average earnings for the highest five consecutive
years of compensation out of the last ten years prior to retirement or other
termination of employment.&#160;&#160;After completing one year of eligibility
service, participants earn a year of credited service for each Plan year during
which they complete 1,000 hours of service.&#160;&#160;Eligible earnings include
base salary and, where applicable, incentive awards or bonuses, if any,
overtime, off-shift differentials and sales commissions.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt"></font>Certain key executives have an
additional Plan benefit equal to an annual benefit determined by multiplying the
participants&#8217; years of credited service times a fixed amount.&#160;&#160;The
amount varies by executive.&#160;&#160;Their additional benefit is referred to
as the &#8220;Funded SERP&#8221; (see below).&#160;&#160;Normal retirement age under the
plan is the earlier of attainment of age 65, or age 64 with 10 or more years of
service.&#160;&#160;The normal form of payment under the Plan for a participant
who is not married is a Single Life Annuity.&#160;&#160;Other actuarially
equivalent forms of payment, including a lump sum, are provided for under the
Plan.&#160;&#160;A subsidized early retirement benefit is available to
participants who retire after attaining age 55 with 10 or more years of
service.&#160;&#160;Under the early retirement formula, a participant who
retires at age 55 having completed 10 or more years of service would receive 72%
of their normal retirement age benefit.&#160;&#160;This percentage increases 4%
for each year closer to age 65 that retirement occurs, with 100% payable at age
62.&#160;&#160;The percentage payable is adjusted pro-rata for payments at
intermediate ages.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt"></font>Federal laws place limitations on
compensation amounts that may be included under a qualified pension plan
($220,000 in 2007) as well as limitations on the total benefit that may be paid
from such plans.&#160;&#160;Pension benefits within the limit are funded by a
pension trust that is separate from the general assets of The Fairchild
Corporation.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Supplemental&#160;
Executive Retirement Plans</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt"></font>We have two supplemental executive
retirement plans for key executives which provide additional retirement benefits
based on final average earnings and years of service, as follows:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="21%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="37%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="30%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="21%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="37%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Unfunded
      SERP</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="30%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Funded
      SERP</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="21%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="37%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="30%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="21%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Retirement
      Benefits</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="37%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Provides
      a maximum retirement benefit (in the aggregate for both Supplemental
      Executive Retirement Plans) equal to the difference between (i) sixty
      percent (60%) of the participant&#8217;s highest base salary for five
      consecutive years of the last ten years of employment, and (ii) the
      aggregate of other pension benefits (including the Funded SERP), profit
      sharing benefits, and primary Social Security payments to which the
      participant is entitled.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="30%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">An
      annual retirement benefit determined by multiplying the participant&#8217;s
      years of credited service times a fixed amount. The amount varies by
      participant.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="21%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="37%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="30%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="21%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Funding</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="37%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">This
      is an unfunded obligation of the Company, not subject to ERISA
      regulations. The Company makes discretionary contributions to a &#8220;Rabbi
      Trust&#8221; to help meet its obligations under this plan, but the assets under
      such trust are subject to the claims of the Company&#8217;s
      creditors.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="30%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">This
      benefit is a part of the Retirement Plan for Employees of the Fairchild
      Corporation. It is a funded obligation of the Company. Such funding
      contributions are not assets available to the creditors of the
      Company.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="21%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="middle" width="37%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;

            <td valign="middle" width="30%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="21%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Pre-Retirement
      Distributions</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="37%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Subject
      to the approval of the Compensation Committee, the plan permits
      participants to elect to receive retirement advances.</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="2%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
            <td valign="top" width="30%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">At
      the participant&#8217;s request upon attainment of Normal Retirement Age as
      defined in the Plan.</font></div>
            </td>

            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="37%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Executive
      Officers. All persons named in the Summary Compensation Table are eligible
      for participation in this plan except Mr. Klaus Esser.</font></div>

      as the unfunded plan.</font></div>

      Years of Service&#160;Accreditation</font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="top" width="37%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Pursuant
      to a letter agreement with Mr. Miller, for purposes of determining years

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">None.</font></div>
            </td>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">94</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt"></font>The Company has frozen (will make no
additional contributions to) the Unfunded SERP benefits at December&#160;31,
2004 payable by the Company to all executive officers except Mr. M. McDonald,
who was not an executive officer at the time the SERP was frozen, and Mr. Esser,
who is not a U.S. participant. Pursuant to the Derivative Settlement, no new
SERP plan shall be created for any existing senior officer of the Company
without the prior approval of two-thirds of the Compensation Committee. As to
SERP plans for individuals who are not executive officers, the Company intends
to amend such SERP plans in order to be in compliance with tax
laws.&#160;&#160;SERP benefits can be paid in a lump sum or as an actuarially
equivalent annuity.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Mr. Esser
does not participate in the above described retirement plans. Under his
employment agreement, Mr.&#160;Esser is entitled to receive such retirement
benefits as provided under German law.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Subject
to the approval of the Compensation Committee, the plan permits participants to
elect to receive retirement advances.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">POTENTIAL
PAYMENTS UPON TERMINATION OR CHANGE OF CONTROL</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt"></font>Individually negotiated payments due to
Named Executive Officers upon termination of employment are set forth in detail
under the heading &#8220;Employment Agreements and Change of Control Arrangements&#8221;,
above.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt"></font>In addition to these specifically
negotiated provisions, the benefits programs of the Company, such as health
insurance, are provided to Named Executive Officers on the same terms as all
salaried employees.&#160;&#160;These benefits cannot be provided as a lump
sum.&#160;&#160;Other perquisites, such as auto compensation, are discontinued
when there is no continuing business use of the vehicle.</font></div>
    <div><br></div>

            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
      Class&#160;A Stock Column includes shares of Class B Stock, which are
      immediately convertible into Class&#160;A Stock on a share-for-share
      basis.&#160;&#160;Options that are exercisable immediately or within sixty
      days after January 16, 2008, appear in the Class&#160;A Stock column.
      Excludes Deferred Compensation Units (&#8220;DCUs&#8221;) to be paid out on
      February&#160;28, 2010 in the form of one share of Class&#160;A Common
      Stock for each DCU as follows: E. Steiner, 42,826 shares; J. Steiner,

              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">A.
      Goren and P. Sassower&#8212;6,902,588 Class A shares held by Phoenix FA
      Holdings, LLC.&#160;&#160;In Form 3&#8217;s filed on January 16 2008, Mr. Goren
      and Mr. Sassower each reported indirect beneficial ownership of these
      shares but disclaimed any beneficial ownership of these securities except
      to the extent of their respective pecuniary interest
      therein.&#160;&#160;(See Footnote
7.)</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">D. Miller
&#8212; 300 shares of Class&#160;A Stock owned by Mr.&#160;Miller as custodian for his
child; Mr.&#160;Miller disclaims any beneficial interest therein.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">E.
Steiner &#8212; 80,000 shares of Class&#160;A Stock held in The Steiner Children&#8217;s
Trust; 29,166 Class&#160;A shares held in 401K Savings Plan. In addition, Eric
Steiner reports beneficial ownership of the Class&#160;A and Class B shares held
by The Steiner Group LLC (see Footnote 6).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">N. Hercot
&#8212; 10,000 shares of Class&#160;A Stock held by her husband. In addition Natalia
Hercot reports beneficial ownership of the Class&#160;A and Class B shares held
by The Steiner Group LLC (see Footnote 6).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">J.
Steiner &#8212; 38,500 shares of Class&#160;A Stock owned by Mr.&#160;Steiner as
custodian for his children; 30,000 shares of Class B Stock (convertible on a

for his children; 2,400 shares of Class&#160;A Stock owned by the Jeffrey
Steiner Family Foundation; and 2,644 shares of Class&#160;A Stock held in his
401k Savings Plan. Mr.&#160;Steiner disclaims beneficial ownership of shares
owned by the Jeffrey Steiner Family Foundation, and shares owned by him as
custodian for his children.</font></div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Phoenix
FA Holdings, LLC (&#8220;Filing Party&#8221; ), SG Phoenix Ventures IV LLC, Philip S.

Street, Suite 1901, New York, New York, 10022.&#160;&#160;Information contained
in Amendment No. 2 to Schedule TO (Tender Offer Statement) originally filed by
Phoenix FA Holdings, LLC (the &#8220;Purchaser&#8221;) on November 19, 2007, as amended on
December 19, 2007 (See Footnote 7.)&#160;&#160;Since January 12, 2005, Roscoe
Avenue Holdings, an affiliate of J. Steiner&#8217;s by virtue of the fact that it is
owned by a trust of which he is a beneficiary, has owned a six percent limited
partnership interest in Phoenix Venture Fund LLC (the &#8220;Venture
Fund&#8221;).&#160;&#160;Neither J. Steiner, nor any of his family or affiliates, has
any management responsibility or investment decision making authority in the
Venture Fund.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

      <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">

            <td style="WIDTH: 27pt">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(6)</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Controlling Interest held by
      LLC:</font>&#160;&#160;The Steiner Group LLC (a Delaware limited liability
      company) (the &#8220;LLC&#8221;) holds 3,193,688 shares of Class&#160;A Stock and
      2,533,996 shares of Class B Stock. It holds a controlling interest in the
      Company.</font></div>
            </td>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Change of
Control:</font>&#160;&#160;Prior to December&#160;31, 2003, Mr.&#160;J. Steiner
was the sole manager of the LLC, and therefore reported beneficial ownership of
the shares held by the LLC. On December&#160;31, 2003, Mr. J. Steiner resigned
as the sole manager of the LLC, and Mr. E. Steiner and Ms. N. Hercot become the
sole co-managers of the LLC. In this capacity, Mr.&#160;E. Steiner and
Ms.&#160;N. Hercot have the ability to vote and to direct the disposition of the
Fairchild shares held by the LLC. Therefore, as of December&#160;31, 2003, Mr.
E. Steiner and Ms. N. Hercot report beneficial ownership of the shares held by
the LLC.</font></div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Membership Interest Held in the
LLC:</font>&#160;&#160;The membership interests in the LLC are held as follows:
(i)&#160;79% is held by The Jeffrey Steiner Family Trust, a trust created for
the benefit of the issue of Jeffrey Steiner; (ii) 20% is held by Bayswater
Ventures, LP, a partnership owned by four different trusts, of which Jeffrey
Steiner is a beneficiary; and (iii)&#160;the remaining&#160;1% membership
interest in the LLC is held by&#160;one of the four partners of Bayswater
Ventures, LP.&#160;&#160;The members of the LLC do not directly have the right
to vote or to direct the disposition of the Fairchild shares held by the
LLC.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">

              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(7)</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On
      November 21, 2007,&#160;Phoenix FA Holdings, LLC, a Delaware limited
      liability company,&#160;&#160;(&#8220;Phoenix&#8221;),&#160;&#160;filed a 13D stating
      that SG Phoenix Ventures IV LLC, the Managing Member of Phoenix, reported
      beneficial ownership of the Fairchild shares held by Phoenix (the
      &#8220;Shares&#8221;).&#160;&#160;The Form 13D stated that Mr. Andrea Goren and Mr.
      Philip S. Sassower, as co-managers of SG Phoenix Ventures IV LLC, may be
      deemed to be the beneficial owners of the Shares.&#160;&#160;On December
      21, 2007, Phoenix filed a Form 3 reporting direct beneficial ownership of
      6,902,588 shares of Fairchild Class A Common Stock (the &#8220;Fairchild
      Shares&#8221;).&#160;&#160;&#160;In Form 3&#8217;s filed on January 16, 2008, Messrs.
      Goren and Sassower each reported indirect beneficial ownership of the
      Fairchild Shares, but disclaimed beneficial ownership of the Fairchild
      Shares except to the extent of their pecuniary interest
      therein.</font></div>
            </td>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><a name="item13">ITEM 13</a>.&#160;&#160;CERTAIN RELATIONSHIPS, RELATED TRANSACTIONS,
AND DIRECTOR INDEPENDENCE</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">CERTAIN
TRANSACTIONS</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
      Company provided a surety for Mr.&#160;Steiner and paid his expenses in
      connection with legal proceedings in France, totaling approximately $5.645
      million, and Mr.&#160;Steiner undertook to repay such amounts to the
      Company if it were ultimately determined that he was not entitled to
      indemnification under Delaware law (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Undertaking</font>&#8221;). Pursuant
      to the Derivative Settlement, the Company and Mr.&#160;Steiner agreed to
      mutually resolve Mr.&#160;Steiner&#8217;s claims for indemnity and his
      obligations to the Company under the Undertaking, by paying the Company
      $3,763,333, of which $833,333 was withdrawn from Mr.&#160;Steiner&#8217;s
      Company SERP account, and $2,930,000 was paid by him via the Company&#8217;s
      D&amp;O liability insurance carrier, in satisfaction of its obligations to
      indemnify and insure
Mr.&#160;Steiner.&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Previously,
      we have extended loans to purchase our Class A common stock to certain
      members of our senior management and Board of Directors, for the purpose
      of encouraging ownership of our stock, and to provide additional incentive
      to promote our success. The loans are non-interest bearing, and have all
      been fully repaid except for one. The remaining outstanding loan is
      non-interest bearing, and matures in approximately one year, or becomes
      due and payable immediately upon the termination of employment if prior to
      such maturity date. On September 30, 2006, the borrower, who is a
      non-executive officer of the Company, owed us approximately $50,000. In
      fiscal 2006, Mr. Steven Gerard, a former director, repaid, when due, his
      outstanding loan. All other loans to directors and executive officers were
      repaid in full prior to September 30, 2005. During 2006, the largest
      aggregate balance of indebtedness outstanding under the officer and
      director stock purchase program was approximately $66,000 from Mr. Gerard,
      and $50,000 from the officer. During 2007, the balance of indebtedness
      outstanding under the officer and director stock purchase program was
      approximately $50,000 due from a single, non-executive officer. In fiscal
      2003, the Board of Directors extended, by five years, the expiration date
      of the loan to that officer, after confirming he was not deemed an
      executive officer. In accordance with the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, no
      new loans will be made to executive officers or
      directors.</font></div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As
      of September 30, 2007, the Steiner family beneficially owns approximately
      60.3% of the aggregate vote of shares of the
      Company.&#160;&#160;Therefore, the ability for individual shareholders to
      influence the direction of the Company may be
  limited.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">On
      September 30, 2007 and 2006, we owed a remaining amount for change of
      control payments of $3.1 million to Mr. J. Steiner. The amount owed to Mr.
      J. Steiner is payable to him upon his termination of employment with us.
      On September 30, 2007, deferred compensation of $11,000 was due from us to
      Mr. E. Steiner.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In
      December 2007, Mr. J. Steiner reimbursed us $704,000 for personal expenses
      that we paid on his behalf, which were outstanding as of September 30,
      2007. &#160;In December 2006, Mr. J. Steiner reimbursed us $40,000 for
      personal expenses that we paid on his behalf, which were outstanding as of
      September 30, 2006.&#160; At no time during 2007 and 2006 did amounts due
      to us from Mr. J. Steiner or Mr. E. Steiner exceed the amount of the
      after-tax salary on deferrals we owed to either Mr. J. Steiner or Mr. E.
      Steiner.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Subject
      to the approval of the Compensation and Stock Option Committee, our
      Unfunded Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan (SERP) permits
      participants to elect to receive retirement advances on an actuarially
      reduced basis. Mr. J. Steiner received pre-retirement distributions from
      the Unfunded SERP (representing a partial distribution of his vested
      benefits) in the amount of $1,400,000 in fiscal 2007 and $3,500,000 in
      fiscal 2006.&#160;&#160;As of September 30, 2007, Mr. J. Steiner&#8217;s
      remaining balance in the Unfunded SERP plan was $704,300.&#160;&#160;Mr.
      D. Miller also took an advance from the Unfunded SERP plan in fiscal 2007
      in the amount of $919,131, representing his full balance in the Unfunded
      SERP.&#160;&#160;Mr. E. Steiner&#8217;s unfunded SERP account has
      $861,763.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Mr.
      E. Steiner, son of J. Steiner, is an executive officer of the
      Company.&#160;&#160;His compensation is set forth in the compensation
      table of our proxy statement. Natalia Hercot, daughter of J. Steiner, is a
      Vice President of the Company, for which she received compensation of
      approximately $13,500 in fiscal 2007 and $20,000 in fiscal
      2006.&#160;&#160;Mrs. Hercot&#8217;s annual salary was adjusted to $10,000 per
      year on December 23, 2005.&#160;&#160;Her income exceeded $10,000 per year
      in fiscal 2007 due to being reimbursed for previously untaken vacation
      time.&#160;&#160;Her monthly salary has been reduced to an amount of Euros
      that will keep her compensation at approximately $10,000 per
      year.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">

            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">During
      2005, Phillipe Hercot, son-in-law of Mr. J. Steiner, subleased a room in
      our Paris office and paid arm's length rent to the
  Company.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">

            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We
      paid $36,000 in 2006 and $36,000 in 2005 for security protection at the
      Steiner Family residence in France.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We
      provide to Mr. J. Steiner automobiles for business use. We charged Mr. J.
      Steiner $15,000 in 2007 and $15,000 in 2006 to cover personal use and the
      cost of these vehicles that exceeded our reimbursement
    policy.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 54pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">During
      2007 and 2006, we reimbursed $0.5 million and $0.4 million, respectively,
      to Mr. J. Steiner, representing a portion of out-of-pocket costs he
      incurred personally in connection with the entertainment of third parties,
      which may benefit the Company.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>

    <div>

      Klaus Esser&#8217;s brother is an employee of PoloExpress. His compensation
      (currently &#8364;72,000) was approximately $94,000 in fiscal 2007 and $94,000
      in fiscal 2006. Petra Esser is a relative of Mr. K. Esser and has current
      annual compensation of approximately
&#8364;16,000.</font></div>
            </td>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">Director
Independence:</font>&#160;&#160;Except for Eric Steiner and Jeffrey Steiner, all
director nominees are &#8220;independent&#8221; as defined in the listing standards of the
New York Stock Exchange, applicable Securities and Exchange Commission Rules,
and the Company&#8217;s Corporate Governance Guidelines.</font></div>
